postCreateCommand: sudo dpkg -r --force-depends python3-dev python3-pip python3-setuptools python3-wheel python3.8-dev conda && sudo apt-get update -y && sudo apt --fix-broken install -y && sudo apt upgrade -y && sudo apt-get install -y postgresql-client unzip -y && sh -c "$(wget -O- https://github.com/deluan/zsh-in-docker/releases/download/v1.2.0/zsh-in-docker.sh)" -- -p git -p https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-autosuggestions -p https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-completions -p https://github.com/zsh-users/zsh-syntax-highlighting -p git-auto-fetch -p rust; echo "[[ ! -f ~/.p10k.zsh ]] || source ~/.p10k.zsh" >> /home/codespace/.zshrc
postStartCommand: cargo install sccache --locked;  echo "export RUSTC_WRAPPER=/usr/local/cargo/bin/sccache" >> /home/codespace/.bashrc; echo "export RUSTC_WRAPPER=/usr/local/cargo/bin/sccache" >> /home/codespace/.zshrc; cd /workspaces/planters_cycle; docker compose up -d; sleep 10; bash ./scripts/create_database.sh; cd api; cargo prisma generate; cd ..; cd ui; bunx prisma generate;
